headline: ABA-Visa, Mastercard: Proposed credit card routing bill would jeopardize security, consumer choice
summary: A proposed bill to impose network routing requirements on banks that issue credit cards would put payments security at risk with no evidence that retailers would pass their cost savings to consumers,...
